description: Courtesy, respect and approachable attitude of store staff.
Ability to explain features, compare models and give clear recommendations.
Ease of finding staff and getting timely attention during busy hours.
Effectiveness in handling complaints, exceptions and special requests.
Presence of desired models, colors and quantities on shelves.
New, sealed, original products in expected condition (no open-box unless stated).
Access to working demo units and hands-on testing before purchase.
Range and diversity of electronic products offered
Shelf price vs checkout price consistency
Price and value, variety and clarity of campaigns and bundles.
Price comparison with competitor companies.
Waiting times and efficiency at checkout and service desks.
Card, cash, mobile and alternative payments and split/tied installment availability.
Correct itemization, IMEI/serial capture and e-invoice/e-archive issuance.
Delivery of products to customer address bought from the store.
Packaging, wrapping and providing appropriate conditions for transportation of products.
Return/exchange process, timeframes, conditions and required documents.
Coverage, duration and claim steps for manufacturer warranties.
Ease of arranging brand-authorized installation for white goods, TVs and audio, air conditioners and smart devices at the store: appointment availability, fees or free campaign offers
Clarity and value of device insurance offered in-store,  what is covered and excluded, ease of enrollment at checkout,
Value, exclusions and pricing of extended protection plans.
Clarity and fairness of device trade‑in evaluation and process.
Ease of buying and redeeming gift cards or vouchers at checkout.
Options to return old electronics or appliances for recycling.
Cleanliness, lighting, temperature and overall shopping comfort.
Clarity of category signage, pricing labels and campaign areas.
Manager availability and effectiveness when issues are escalated.
Overall satisfaction with the in‑store buying experience.
Feedback that does not clearly fall into any specific category
Feedback that contains any other topic
